:orphan:



.. _sphx_glr_auto_examples:

Getting started with Python for physical computing
===================================================================

This part of the *Python for physical computing* is a self-contained introduction to
everything that is needed to use  Python for physical computing , from the language
itself, to numerical computing or plotting.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="This oscilloscope example code grabs data from PhyCom and plot it in realTime">

.. only:: html

 .. figure:: /auto_examples/images/thumb/sphx_glr_oscilloscope_thumb.png

     :ref:`sphx_glr_auto_examples_oscilloscope.py`

.. raw:: html

    </div>
